document_data.mainbody:
erendil was a quaggoth who inhabited the Underdark during the late 1480s DR.
Under the influence of the demon lord Fraz-Urbluu, Derendil believed himself to be an elven prince from the kingdom of Nelrindenvane in the High Forest who was polymorphed into a quaggoth by an evil wizard. Nobody could convince him that his story was false.
Derendil was captured by drow slavers of Velkynvelve during the late 1480s DR.
